Article Title: ‚ÄúIt resets my heart‚Äù: Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô billionaire heiress Gracie Hunt hints at how she‚Äôs coping with the team‚Äôs poor season
Article Text:
Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô billionaire heiress Gracie Hunt hints at how she‚Äôs coping with the team‚Äôs poor season.(Image via courtesy of The Kansas City Chiefs/Sydney Schneider)

Gracie Hunt has her boyfriend, Derek Green , by her side as she copes with the disappointing season of the Kansas City Chiefs

Gracie Hunt has been pretty public about her love for her boyfriend, Derek Green

The Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has been a constant presence on the field as she has stayed by the team‚Äôs side through all the good and bad days.While the Kansas City Chiefs have had a pretty disappointing end in the ongoing season, the 26 year old billionaire heiress has hinted at how she has been coping with it.A few days ago, the billionaire heiress of the team shared an update about her life as she looked stunning in a green colored athleisure set by Alo as she geared up to play a game of pickleball with her boyfriend, Derek Green.ID@undefinedCaption not available.The caption of the post reads as, ‚ÄúReady to rally. Lately I‚Äôve been leaning into simple joys‚Äîfresh air, good movement, and a little *friendly* competition on the court. üòú There‚Äôs something about pickleball that feels like play again, not pressure, and I‚Äôve been loving every minute of it.‚ÄùGracie Hunt added, ‚ÄúWeekend activities like this fill my cup and reset my heart in the best way. I hope this inspires you to move your body in whatever way feels joyful, not forced. Sending you lots of sunshine and good energy wherever you are.‚ÄùThe heartfelt post showed Gracie Hunt looking pretty excited as she played a round of pickleball with her boyfriend, Derek Green.Gracie Hunt has been very public with how her boyfriend, Derek Green, has completely changed her life for the better after she fell deeply in love with him last year.After going public with their relationship last year, Gracie Hunt spoke to PEOPLE about it as she said, ‚ÄúWe would actually play together as babies during the Chiefs‚Äô Christmas parties every year, and then we reconnected as adults in 2017 and met on the sidelines pregame‚Ä¶‚ÄùGracie Hunt added, ‚ÄúWe reconnected in early March and have been inseparable ever since.‚ÄùThe billionaire 25 year old continued, ‚ÄúDerek and I have known each other our whole lives‚Ä¶‚ÄùIt seems while the disappointing season of the Kansas City Chiefs has been a tough loss for the team, Gracie Hunt has found Derek Green to be by her side through the difficult time.
Article Summary: Gracie hunt has been very public with how her boyfriend, derek green, has completely changed her life for the better after she fell deeply in love with him last year. The billionaire heiress of the team shared an update about her life as she geared up to play a game of pickleball.

Article Title: Alex de Minaur and Katie Boulter combined net worth: Inside tennis couple‚Äôs earnings, sponsors, and rising wealth
Article Text:
Alex de Minaur and Katie Boulter combined net worth: Inside tennis couple‚Äôs earnings, sponsors, and rising wealth (Image via Getty)

Alex de Minaur prize money and career earnings

Katie Boulter prize money and WTA success

Alex de Minaur and Katie Boulter brand deals

Alex de Minaur and Katie Boulter combined net worth

Alex de Minaur and Katie Boulter are one of tennis‚Äôs most loved couples right now. Fans enjoy watching them play big matches and cheer for each other from the stands. Their success on court has also brought in solid money. With their engagement announced in late 2024 and wedding talk growing, many fans are now curious about their combined net worth and how they earn their money.Alex de Minaur has built most of his wealth through match wins on the ATP Tour. According to the official ATP website, he has earned over $22 million in career prize money as of early 2026. His biggest money years came from strong runs in 2023, 2024, and 2025.In December 2024, Alex won the UTS Grand Final in London, which paid him $640,000, as reported by UTS Tennis and BBC Sport. He has also won multiple ATP titles, including events in Acapulco and Los Cabos. These wins have helped him stay inside the world‚Äôs top group and keep his earnings steady.Katie Boulter has also seen steady growth in her earnings. The official WTA website lists her career prize money at close to $4 million. A large share of this came from her strong 2024 season.In June 2024, Katie Boulter won the Nottingham Open, a WTA 250 event, in front of her home fans in England.That win boosted both her ranking and income. She also had solid runs at Grand Slam events, adding more prize money through match wins. Her rise on the WTA Tour has made her one of Britain‚Äôs top women players today.Prize money is only part of their income. Alex de Minaur has sponsorship deals with Asics for clothing and shoes, Wilson for rackets, and TAG Heuer for watches. These partnerships are confirmed on brand websites and player profiles.Katie Boulter is backed by Nike for apparel and Wilson for rackets. She has also worked with Lexus, which has supported her travel during tournaments. These deals add a strong off-court income stream for both players.Exact net worth numbers are not made public by players. However, based on prize money records and brand deals, Celebrity Net Worth estimate Alex de Minaur‚Äôs net worth at $3‚Äì4 million. Katie Boulter‚Äôs net worth is estimated at $2‚Äì2.5 million.Together, their combined net worth is estimated between $5 and $6.5 million. This figure reflects only known earnings and deals.
Article Summary: Alex de minaur and katie boulter are one of tennis‚Äôs most loved couples. Fans enjoy watching them play big matches and cheer for each other from the stands. Their success on court has also brought in solid money. With their engagement announced in late 2024 and wedding talk growing, many fans are now curious about their combined net worth.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes questioned Travis Kelce‚Äôs Taylor Swift romance before seeing it himself
Article Text:
Patrick Mahomes revealed he initially doubted Travis Kelce‚Äôs relationship with Taylor Swift until she appeared at Arrowhead Stadium. ESPN‚Äôs The Kingdom showed locker room disbelief, massive fan buzz, and how Swift‚Äôs presence reshaped game day energy. Teammates admitted the attention was overwhelming, yet the Chiefs stayed focused and won.

How Taylor Swift‚Äôs first Chiefs game changed everything inside the locker room

The moment Taylor Swift walked into Arrowhead Stadium, the Kansas City Chiefs felt it instantly. Phones buzzed. Heads turned. Energy shifted. What began as a regular-season game against the Chicago Bears quietly transformed into one of the most talked-about crossover moments in modern sports culture. Long before the internet caught up, the buzz was already echoing through the locker room.Inside the Chiefs organization, disbelief mixed with excitement. This was not just another celebrity sighting. It was Taylor Swift showing up for Travis Kelce, and it forced teammates to process the moment in real time while preparing to win a football game. For some, it felt unreal. For others, it felt historic.ESPN‚Äôs documentary The Kingdom captured those early reactions with rare honesty. Defensive tackle Chris Jones summed it up perfectly, saying, ‚ÄúYou know the locker room was like, ‚ÄòTaylor Swift‚Äôs here. Taylor Swift‚Äôs here. For real? With Travis? Oh my god.‚Äô‚Äù He added, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre like, ‚ÄòOh my god, Travis pulled Taylor Swift,‚Äô‚Äù a line that quickly became one of the episode‚Äôs most replayed moments.Quarterback Patrick Mahomes admitted he was skeptical at first, even after Kelce gave him advance notice.‚ÄúHe told me during the week. I was one of those like, ‚ÄòI got to see it, you know? I got to see it until I believe it,‚Äô‚Äù Mahomes said. Once the game began, the distraction was impossible to miss. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs the first person I noticed. I didn‚Äôt see anybody else,‚Äù he told Kelce on the sideline.Mahomes later explained the atmosphere shift, saying, ‚ÄúYou definitely felt the buzz and you could see people in the stadium gravitating toward where she was at there.‚Äù Still, the focus never wavered. ‚ÄúBut at the same time, we had business to handle.‚ÄùHead coach Andy Reid added another layer to the story, revealing, ‚ÄúBy that time, I knew they were going out. I knew her before him.‚Äù He even joked about Kelce‚Äôs reaction when Swift mentioned their connection, recalling, ‚ÄúAnd he went, ‚ÄòOh no.‚Äô‚ÄùAs the postseason unfolded, Taylor Swift became part of the Chiefs‚Äô inner circle. After the AFC Championship win, cameras caught her thanking Brittany Mahomes for emotional support, saying, ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve kept me so calm the last couple weeks. I did not know what to do and I‚Äôd just text Brittany and just be like, ‚ÄòTell me it‚Äôs going to be OK. Tell me it‚Äôs going to be OK.‚ÄùWhat started as a rumor ended up reshaping the NFL spotlight. As one teammate put it best, ‚ÄúThe Swifties are a real thing.‚Äù
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes revealed he initially doubted travis kelce's relationship with taylor swift. Espn‚Äôs the kingdom showed locker room disbelief, massive fan buzz. Teammates admitted the attention was overwhelming, yet the chiefs stayed focused. As one teammate put it best, ‚Äúthe swifties are a real thing.‚Äù

Article Title: Is Josh Jacobs dating influencer and entrepreneur Ash Kaashh days after she was rumored to be with Caleb Williams?
Article Text:
Josh Jacobs and Ash Kaashh spark dating speculation.(Image via Imagn Images, Ash Kaashh/Instagram)

Ash Kaashh was rumored to be dating Caleb Williams before being spotted with Josh Jacobs

Josh Jacobs is getting trolled for his connection with Ash Kaashh

The Green Bay Packers‚Äô star player, Josh Jacobs, has sparked chaos with a video he posted allegedly alongside popular influencer, model and streamer, Ash (Ashaley) Kaashh.A few hours ago, fans were quick to notice and reshare Josh Jacobs‚Äô Snapchat video which shows him walking on the beach as he held hands with Ash (Ashaley) Kaashh. This has sparked chaos among fans as Ash Kaashh was rumored to be dating Caleb Williams , just a few weeks ago.Just a few weeks ago, popular social media influencer, Ash Kaashh was spotted attending a few matches of the Chicago Bears and while there was no definite proof, fans were quick to link her with Caleb Williams.This had been going on for a few weeks but neither Caleb Williams nor Ash Kaashh denied or accepted their dating rumors.As the Chicago Bears took the field this past weekend, Ash Kaashh was no longer spotted cheering on the team, as she posted several pictures from a vacation she was on with her friends.However, Josh Jacobs‚Äô recent post on Snapchat has sparked chaos among fans about his alleged connection to Ash Kaashh.This has also led to Josh Jacobs getting brutally trolled by fans since Ash Kaashh was rumored to be with Caleb Williams, just a few days ago.Neither Josh Jacobs nor Ash Kaashh has made any comments about the romance rumors yet as they continue to remain silent.While Josh Jacobs has maintained privacy over his personal life throughout the years, Ash Kaashh has had a pretty public romance with former NBA player, Sharife Cooper.The two ended things in 2024 when Sharife Cooper said, ‚ÄúI thought it was just two people that was in a relationship. No things happened, of course, whether it was on her end or my end. I wasn‚Äôt perfect in no situation. I don‚Äôt think she was perfect, but, you know, at the end of the day, we were two young people, you know, trying to blend two completely different lives together.‚Äù
Article Summary: Green bay packers star player, josh jacobs, has sparked chaos with a video he posted allegedly alongside popular influencer, model and streamer, ash (ashaley) kaashh. A few hours ago, fans were quick to notice and reshare josh jacobs‚Äô snapchat video which shows him walking on the beach as he held hands with ash.

Article Title: ‚ÄúHow did you feel when Draymond punched you?‚Äù - New Orleans Pelicans guard Jordan Poole stunned as young fan brings up moment that changed his Warriors run
Article Text:
New Orleans Pelicans shooting guard Jordan Poole (Images via: Getty Images)

Kid‚Äôs unexpected question forces Jordan Poole to revisit Draymond Green punch moment

How one practice altercation between Jordan Poole and Draymond Green changed the Warriors‚Äô season?

Jordan Poole, now a guard for the New Orleans Pelicans, recently spent some time talking to a group of young basketball fans. It was meant to be a fun session, with kids asking questions about his journey in the NBA. But one question from a young fan caught him completely off guard and reminded him of a difficult moment from his time with the Golden State Warriors.The moment reminded everyone that even professional players have moments in their careers that stay with them, and for Poole, this involved a well-known incident with former teammate Draymond Green. What started as a simple meetup with kids turned into a conversation about one of the most talked-about moments in recent NBA history.Recently, Jordan Poole visited a group of young fans to answer questions and share his experiences. He expected questions about basketball and his favorite players. But one curious young fan surprised him by asking about the infamous punch from Draymond Green:‚ÄúHow did you feel when Draymond punched you?‚ÄùThe unexpected question clearly caught him off guard, but he handled it calmly, without getting defensive, saying, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs tough, bro‚Äù, before the clip cut.Jordan Poole admitted it was a tough moment, showing maturity and growth as a player. Instead of avoiding the topic, he acknowledged the past and used it as a learning experience. The incident highlighted that even NBA players face challenges, and also how young children‚Äôs curiosity can spark conversations that adults sometimes try to avoid.Back in October 2022, during a Warriors practice, tensions between Jordan Poole and Draymond Green were growing. An argument between the two escalated, and Green ended up punching Poole. This happened just a few months after the Warriors had won the 2022 NBA championship, and the incident created tension in a locker room that had been very united.The exact reason behind the punch was never officially confirmed, but it was clear that harsh words were exchanged. The event affected the team‚Äôs chemistry, and many believe it played a part in the Warriors' failure to win the championship title the following season. After the 2022‚Äì23 season, Poole was traded to the Washington Wizards, and Green later admitted:‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt call a man the b-word and push him and not get hit either,‚Äù so that was part of it‚Äù, indicating that the incident was one of his biggest mistakes.
Article Summary: Jordan poole visited a group of young basketball fans to answer questions. One young fan asked about the infamous punch from draymond green. Poole admitted it was a tough moment, showing maturity and growth as a player. The incident highlighted that even nba players face challenges.

Article Title: NHL Olympic break: Everything about the league schedule, trade deadline, playoff fixtures and more
Article Text:
2026 Winter Olympics at Milan-Cortine (Via Getty Images)

International break kicking off in February

Who Will Win Gold At The 2026 Winter Olympics? | SDP

Olympic Tournament Schedule

Trade Deadline and Playoff Push

The NHL season is past the halfway point and a crucial stretch lies ahead. The biggest event on the calendar will take place overseas when the league shuts down operations to send its best players to the Winter Olympics in Milan, Italy.It marks the first Olympic participation for NHL players since 2014, ending a 12-year absence that kept stars like Connor McDavid, Nathan MacKinnon and Auston Matthews from representing their countries on hockey's biggest international stage.The break will dominate the middle portion of the schedule before teams return for the trade deadline and playoff positioning battles. The timing creates a unique rhythm for the season. Teams will play their final games before the break on February 5, with seven matchups scheduled, and then the league goes dark for nearly three weeks while the hockey world turns its attention to Milan. The men's hockey tournament begins February 11 with two games.Team USA opens play on February 12 against Latvia before competing in round-robin action through February 15. The format awards the three group winners and the best second-place team with byes directly to the quarterfinals.Teams ranked fifth through 12th will compete in playoff qualification games on February 17, with quarterfinals following on February 18 and semifinals on February 20. The bronze medal game is scheduled for February 21 with the gold medal game taking place February 22.No NHL trades can be processed during the Olympic break. NHL play resumes February 25 with eight games scheduled. Teams will have just nine days to evaluate their rosters before the trade deadline hits at 3 PM Eastern on March 6.The regular season concludes April 16 with six games, giving teams slightly more than a month after the deadline to solidify playoff positioning. The Stanley Cup playoffs are set to open April 18. Looking further ahead, the NHL draft takes place June 26-27 at Buffalo's KeyBank Center.Top prospects will attend while general managers work remotely, matching last year's format. Free agency opens at noon Eastern on July 1. The Olympic break represents the season's defining interruption, forcing teams to manage momentum while their best players compete overseas.How clubs handle the pause could determine which organizations thrive down the stretch and which fall short of playoff expectations.
Article Summary: The nhl will take a three-week break to send its best players to the winter olympics in milan, italy. The break will dominate the middle portion of the schedule before teams return for the trade deadline and playoff positioning battles. It marks the first olympic participation for nhl players since 2014.

Article Title: Anthony Davis‚Äô trade drama escalates as his agent pushes Dallas for a quick exit
Article Text:
Anthony Davis and Rich Paul (Images via Getty)

Anthony Davis‚Äô agent Rich Paul gives the Mavs an ultimatum

The Hoop Collective earlier this month

Mavs‚Äô Flagg factor and a bench in turmoil

The NBA rumor mill has just shifted into overdrive with Anthony Davis‚Äô trade saga. According to bombshell reports from ESPN, Rich Paul, the high-powered CEO of Klutch Sports, has reportedly delivered a clear ultimatum to the Mavericks. While the February 5th deadline is looming, Paul is reportedly pushing for an immediate resolution to get the 10-time All-Star out of the Big D by next week.The timing couldn‚Äôt be more chaotic as the Mavericks are struggling in the West. They are currently at 12th place with a 19-26 record and a 14-11 at home. Davis got sidelined with left hand ligament injury against the Utah Jazz on January 8th and has been reported to remain out through February. For the Mavs front office and fans, Davis‚Äô underperformance remains a sore subject, and this trade demand by Rich Paul feels like the messy climax to a star experiment that didn‚Äôt pay off even after trading Luka Doncic.When the Dallas Mavericks acquired Davis back in early 2025 in exchange for sending their star player, Luka Doncic, two things happened. First came the fan outrage with ‚Äúfire Nico‚Äù chants at every game.Second was the sky-high expectations from the 2024 Olympic Gold medalist.‚ÄôThe vision was to build a dominant roster with Anthony Davis, Kyrie Irving, and rookie phenom Cooper Flagg, turning the Mavs into immediate contenders. But what instead unfolded was Davis‚Äô series of injuries. He just appeared in 20 games this season and averaged 20.4 points, 11.1 rebounds, and 2.8 assists.‚ÄúIt is very clear that Rich Paul, who represents Anthony Davis, wants Anthony Davis traded before the deadline,‚Äù MacMahon reported on. ‚ÄúHe believes it‚Äôs in his best business interest, because he has taken a ‚ÄòWell, we‚Äôll see‚Äô from the Mavericks regarding an extension as a ‚Äòno.‚Äô‚ÄùDespite all the drama, Mavericks‚Äô Copper factor is working its magic on the court. The rookie sensation is averaging 18.8 points, 6.4 rebounds, and 4.1 assists while shooting 47.7% from the field. But a lone man can‚Äôt run the show. With Kyrie Irving still recovering from ACL surgery, the Mavericks' roster is thin and too much for a 19-year-old to carry.Patrick Dumont isn't backing down easily. Insiders claim the team has no intention of being bullied into a bad deal. They want a haul of draft picks and young talent, not just a salary dump. Whether it‚Äôs a late-night deal with the Hawks or a blockbuster with the Raptors, the next seven days will determine if Dallas is building for the future or simply stuck in the mud.
Article Summary: The nba rumor mill has just shifted into overdrive with anthony davis‚Äô trade saga. Rich paul, the high-powered ceo of klutch sports, has reportedly delivered a clear ultimatum to the mavericks. While the february 5th deadline is looming, paul is reportedly pushing for an immediate resolution to get the 10-time all-star out of the big d by next week.

Article Title: Evgeni Malkin shuts down retirement talk after strong performance as Pittsburgh Penguins demolish Oilers
Article Text:
Evgeni Malkin with the Pittsburgh Penguins (Via Getty Images)

Evgeni Malkin contributes two points as Oilers get beaten 6-2 by Penguins

Evgeni Malkin scored a breakaway goal against his former teammate Thursday night, stripped the puck from Connor McDavid to set up the play, and looked every bit like a player who belongs in the NHL for years to come.The Penguins cruised past Edmonton 6-2 in a statement win that extended their winning streak to three games and improved their record to 10-2-2 since the holiday break. Pittsburgh now sits in second place in the Metropolitan Division with 25-14-11, firmly in playoff position after a rough stretch earlier in the season.When a reporter noted after the game that Malkin doesn't look like someone preparing to retire anytime soon, the 39-year-old had a quick response. "I never say I want to, you know, it's all you," Malkin said. "But again I feel great, and again, like how we play, it's always fun to win."Malkin's performance Thursday showcased the skill and hockey sense that made him one of the game's elite centers for nearly two decades. He poked the puck away from McDavid at the Pittsburgh blue line despite being at the end of a 1:21 shift, then raced down ice on a breakaway and beat Tristan Jarry with a backhand through the pads.The goal made it 5-1 and effectively ended any hope of an Edmonton comeback. Malkin also assisted on Rickard Rakell's goal earlier in the second period, threading a pass from behind the net through traffic to set up the finish.The reporter pressed further, suggesting Malkin's legs look as good as they have in quite some time. "I don't know; it's hard to say, but I hope that you see," Malkin said. "I mean, it's not easy. I mean, but again, I try to do my best because I know I won't play like I won't play for many more years."Malkin's message was clear even through the language barrier. He knows his time is limited, but that reality only drives him to prove he still belongs at the NHL level. The veteran‚Äôs passion was visible as he explained, "You know, I want to show, like, I see a great player."He continued, "You know, I want to see like I want to see everybody see like I can't play next year. You know, it's my goal right now." Malkin has made it clear that he is enjoying his time playing alongside his teammates as the Russian and longtime linemate Sidney Crosby look to finally break their playoff drought.He singled out his linemates Tommy Novak and Egor Chinakhov for praise, highlighting how the unit has clicked in recent games. "I think we have a great team," Malkin continued. "Just stay same level. We have a chance to win every game." With the Penguins in great form, they look forward to their upcoming games.
Article Summary: Evgeni malkin scored a breakaway goal against his former teammate thursday night. The penguins cruised past edmonton 6-2 in a statement win that extended their winning streak to three games. Pittsburgh now sits in second place in the metropolitan division with 25-14-11.

Article Title: John Brodie cause of death: Former 49ers MVP quarterback passes away at 90
Article Text:
John Brodie, the longtime face of the San Francisco 49ers, has died at 90. An NFL MVP and franchise icon, Brodie spent 17 seasons with San Francisco, setting passing records and earning All Pro honors. He later became a broadcaster and accomplished golfer, leaving a lasting legacy across sports.

NFL MVP and longtime 49ers star John Brodie passes away at 90



The death of a football legend has created a profound silence on the field of San Francisco and the whole NFL. John Brodie was not just another quarter back in another era. He represented the element of consistency, hardness, and faithfulness at the period when the league was yet discovering its current identity. The passing of a 90-year-old player is the end of an era of a player who had an impact that was much more than statistics and box scores.Brodie was the symbol of stability in change to generations of 49ers fans. He performed in the period when Super Bowls were not used to mark legacies, but his presence is imprinted in the history of the franchise. Whenever leadership, longevity, and silent superiority in a crisis are discussed, his name continues to be mentioned. While his death was recently reported, a specific cause was not immediately disclosed, though he had previously overcome a severe stroke in 2000.John Brodie spent his entire 17 year NFL career with the San Francisco 49ers, a franchise record that still stands. The team confirmed he died Friday, with his family noting he had suffered a stroke in 2000. Brodie won the NFL MVP award in 1970 and retired as one of the most productive passers the league had ever seen.‚ÄúThe 49ers family is saddened to learn of the passing of one of the franchise‚Äôs all-time great players, John Brodie,‚Äù said team co-chairman John York. ‚ÄúAs a kid, my 49ers fandom began by watching John play quarterback on television. He displayed an incredible commitment toward his teammates and his support of the organization never wavered after his playing days.‚ÄúJohn became a dear friend of mine, and he will always be remembered as an important part of 49ers history. We express our deepest condolences to his wife, Sue, and the entire Brodie family.‚ÄùBrodie‚Äôs numbers still resonate. His 31,548 passing yards rank second in franchise history behind Joe Montana, and his 214 touchdown passes remain third all time for the team. He led the NFL in passing yards three times and earned multiple All Pro honors.Those who played alongside him remember more than stats. ‚ÄúHe was a great guy, a super competitor, I don‚Äôt care what it was: football, cards, golf,‚Äù former teammate Jerry Mertens said. ‚ÄúThe guy just did it all, and he was a great leader, there‚Äôs no question about that.‚ÄùAfter football, Brodie thrived as a broadcaster and elite golfer, even winning on the senior tour. Few athletes have lived so fully in competition. Even fewer left behind a legacy as complete.
Article Summary: John brodie, the longtime face of the san francisco 49ers, has died at 90. An nfl mvp and franchise icon, brodie spent 17 seasons with san francisco. He later became a broadcaster and accomplished golfer, leaving a lasting legacy across sports.

Article Title: Former NBA legend Derrick Rose receives heartfelt banner tribute from Chicago Bulls ahead of jersey retirement
Article Text:
Former Chicago Bulls star Derrick Rose (Image via: Getty Images)

Derrick Rose‚Äôs banner brings back Chicago city's greatest memories

Derrick Rose‚Äôs influence endures as Chicago continues to celebrate his legacy



On January 23, 2026, former Chicago Bulls‚Äô star Derrick Rose was surprised by the team when he was invited to the United Center to see his jersey banner raised for the first time. The moment came a day before his official jersey retirement ceremony on January 24.Derrick Rose, who grew up in Chicago, was very emotional as he looked up and saw his No. 1 banner hanging in the arena. His family was there with him, along with former teammates Joakim Noah, Taj Gibson, and Kirk Hinrich, which made the moment even more special.The timing of the surprise made it even better, since Rose‚Äôs official jersey retirement takes place on January 24, 2026. His No. 1 jersey will now hang in the United Center with other Bulls legends like Michael Jordan and Scottie Pippen.For many Chicago Bulls fans, it brought back the memories and the excitement Rose created during his time with the team. And even though he played for other teams as well, such as the Knicks, Cavaliers, Jazz, Timberwolves, Pistons, and Grizzlies, his career meant a lot to the city and the people of Chicago. From MVP season to fighting injuries, the banner thus represents the work he put in and what he gave to the city's basketball.In 2008, Derrick Rose was picked as the No.1 overall draft choice by the Chicago Bulls. After 16 seasons in the NBA, Rose announced his retirement on September 26, 2024, by sharing a heartfelt message on social media thanking his fans and the game he loved playing, and for all the wonderful years in the league.Off the court, Rose has continued to stay connected to the city of Chicago. He has supported community works and even opened a family-owned flower shop in the city. Seeing his banner for the first time wasn‚Äôt just about basketball, it showed the respect and love the city still has for him.
Article Summary: Former chicago bulls star derrick rose was surprised by the team when he was invited to the united center to see his jersey banner raised for the first time. The moment came a day before his official jersey retirement ceremony on january 24.

Article Title: T20 World Cup drama: 'If Bangladesh don't play, it won't matter; if Pakistan refuse ... ': Ex-Pak cricketer's brutal take
Article Text:
Image credit: Agencies

Arshdeep Singh press conference: on adapting to conditions, team roles & bowling plans | IND vs NZ 1st T20I

Former Pakistan spinner Danish Kaneria has backed the ICC‚Äôs decision to stick to the original schedule after the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) chose not to travel to India for the 2026 ICC Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup. Kaneria said Bangladesh opting out would not make much of an impact, remarking that ‚Äúit‚Äôs not like they were going to finish in the top four. ‚ÄùBangladesh had earlier informed the ICC of its decision not to travel to India, citing security concerns amid strained relations between the two countries, and requested that its matches be shifted to Sri Lanka. However, the ICC reiterated on Wednesday that the T20 World Cup will go ahead as planned, with Bangladesh‚Äôs matches scheduled to be played in India.The standoff comes in the backdrop of the BCCI directing Kolkata Knight Riders to release Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman ahead of IPL 2026 amid prevailing political tensions.Speaking to IANS, Kaneria said, ‚ÄúThere was the issue of Mustafizur, who was with KKR, and the team was forced to sideline him because of the kind of unrest and the public reaction. Shah Rukh Khan, who is the owner of KKR, released him. There was no pressure from the BCCI, nor from the ICC.But for humanity, he did what he thought was right.‚ÄúThe BCCI or ICC never asked Bangladesh not to come to India. They welcomed them. All the teams in the ICC umbrella get foolproof security.‚ÄùReferring to the ICC meeting that followed, Kaneria added, ‚ÄúYou saw that a meeting took place where all the boards were present‚Äîfrom England to Australia, West Indies‚Äîevery board that is part of the ICC was there. When voting took place, everyone supported what the ICC proposed. Only the Pakistan Cricket Board voted along with Bangladesh. Just two votes went against it.‚ÄùKaneria also described the developments in Bangladesh prior to the standoff as disturbing on humanitarian grounds.‚ÄúWhen I look at this entire scenario, what was going on in Bangladesh, the kind of situation that developed there, the way our Hindu brothers and sisters and others were treated, the way incidents happened, it was wrong, first of all,‚Äù Kaneria said.‚ÄúOur religion doesn‚Äôt teach violence; it is a religion of love. People were just earning their livelihood, doing their jobs, and they were attacked without any reason. The strange and disturbing acts that took place were very sad. It really makes your heart sink‚Äîwhat is going on?‚ÄùThe former spinner warned that Bangladesh‚Äôs firm stance could hurt the country‚Äôs cricketing future in the long run.‚ÄúIn my view, this is not going to be good for Bangladesh in the long run. If they think that whatever they say should be accepted by the ICC as a decision, that won‚Äôt work. Going forward, India will not play with Bangladesh anyway, and that will be a big loss for them.‚ÄùBacking the ICC‚Äôs decision-making process, Kaneria stressed that major tournaments cannot be altered at the last moment. ‚ÄúI believe the ICC‚Äôs decision is absolutely correct, because things cannot be changed at the last minute. You have to prepare the entire tournament structure, schedules, and team travel. You have to change the whole scenario.‚ÄúIf Bangladesh feels they don‚Äôt want to play, then don‚Äôt play. It won‚Äôt make much difference anyway; it‚Äôs not like they were going to finish in the top four,‚Äù he added.Dismissing reports that Pakistan could follow Bangladesh‚Äôs lead, Kaneria said the ICC has alternatives in place.‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think that will happen. Because who suffers the loss? The country that backs out suffers the loss. There are penalties, rules and regulations. If Bangladesh doesn‚Äôt go, Scotland can come in. If Pakistan refuses, some other team will come. Namibia is playing very good cricket. The ICC and BCCI won‚Äôt be affected.‚ÄùKaneria also pointed out that Bangladesh‚Äôs participation could have opened doors for its players in the IPL. ‚ÄúIf Bangladesh had come to play the T20 World Cup in India, then the barrier that has been created in the IPL with Mustafizur Rahman would have broken, and more Bangladeshi players would have taken part in the league.‚ÄùHe further lamented the shift in cricket discourse away from the sport itself.‚ÄúNow cricket is no longer being discussed, and only politics is being talked about. Earlier, people talked about wickets, bowling, and techniques. Now everything has become political.‚Äù‚ÄúTechnical cricket doesn‚Äôt sell. What sells? Kohli vs Babar comparisons. Shaheen Afridi vs Bumrah comparisons,‚Äù he noted.Calling for restraint, Kaneria urged stakeholders to keep politics out of the sport.‚ÄúFor the future generation, it is very important that cricket is protected and promoted. Look at cricket as cricket. Let politics remain with politicians and authorities. Do not involve cricket in politics.‚ÄùHe concluded by emphasising the need for long-term thinking. ‚ÄúYou have to look at the long picture, not the short. Now let‚Äôs see what the final decision is, though in my opinion it must already have been taken, as nearly 24 hours have passed. What is good for cricket must be done, and as I said earlier, Scotland would already be preparing to face spin.‚Äù
Article Summary: Danish kaneria has backed the icc's decision to stick to the original schedule for the 2026 icc men's t20 world cup. Kaneria said bangladesh opting out would not make much of an impact, remarking that ‚Äúit‚Äôs not like they were going to finish in the top four.

Article Title: T20 World Cup: BCB writes another letter to ICC, seeks intervention of independent dispute resolution committee
Article Text:
Bangladesh government‚Äôs Sports Adviser Asif Nazrul addresses a press conference on the issue of Bangladesh‚Äôs participation in the upcoming ICC Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup in India, citing security concerns, in Dhaka on Thursday, January 22, 2026.

NEW DELHI:

'Indian cricket no less than Bollywood abroad' | Bombay Sport Exchange

What is the Dispute Resolution Committee?

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

What is Bangladesh‚Äôs stance?

What is the ICC‚Äôs stand?

What sparked the standoff?

Poll Should the ICC consider moving the T20 World Cup matches from India to a neutral venue? Yes, for security reasons No, it should remain in India Undecided Only if the BCB provides more evidence

Hours after standing firm on its demand to have its T20 World Cup matches moved from India to Sri Lanka, the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) has written another letter to the International Cricket Council (ICC), requesting that Bangladesh‚Äôs demand for a change of venue be referred to the ICC‚Äôs independent dispute resolution committee, TimesofIndia.com has learnt.The committee, which consists of independent lawyers, resolves disputes related to ICC matters. The BCB hopes the ICC will respond to the request and refer the demand for a venue change to the Dispute Resolution Committee (DRC).The ICC Dispute Resolution Committee is an independent arbitration body that resolves disputes connected to international cricket. It can hear cases involving the ICC, member boards, players, officials and related parties, once all internal remedies have been exhausted.Operating under English law with proceedings seated in London, the DRC conducts confidential arbitration through independent panels. Its role is to assess the lawfulness and interpretation of ICC decisions, regulations and contracts, rather than act as an appeal forum.DRC rulings are final and binding, with no right of appeal except on very limited procedural grounds.Bangladesh has reiterated that its refusal to play the upcoming T20 World Cup in India is solely due to security concerns and is a sovereign decision.Sports Adviser Asif Nazrul said on Thursday that there is no scope for Bangladesh to change its decision not to travel to India for the tournament.‚ÄúAs the ICC has also not accepted Bangladesh‚Äôs request to change the venue, it now effectively means that Bangladesh will not be taking part in this year‚Äôs T20 World Cup,‚Äù Nazrul told reporters in Dhaka after meeting senior Bangladesh cricketers.Nazrul also accused the ICC of failing to ensure justice by not considering Bangladesh‚Äôs request for a venue shift.‚ÄúOur security risk in playing in India has not changed at all,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThis concern did not arise from any imaginary analysis or assumption. It arose from a real incident, where one of the best players of our country was forced to bow his head before extremists, and the Indian cricket board removed him from India, plainly speaking, asked him to leave.‚ÄùEarlier on Wednesday, the ICC rejected the BCB‚Äôs request to relocate Bangladesh‚Äôs matches from India and decided to keep the tournament schedule unchanged following a board meeting. The ICC also gave the BCB a one-day deadline to decide, after consulting the government, whether the team would travel to India.‚ÄúThe ICC‚Äôs venue and scheduling decisions are guided by objective threat assessments, host guarantees and the tournament‚Äôs agreed terms of participation, which apply uniformly to all 20 competing nations,‚Äù the ICC said in a statement.‚ÄúIn the absence of any independent security findings that materially compromise the safety of the Bangladesh team, the ICC is unable to relocate fixtures. Doing so would carry significant logistical and scheduling consequences for other teams and fans worldwide, and would also create precedent-related challenges that risk undermining the neutrality, fairness and integrity of ICC governance.‚ÄùBangladesh are in Group C alongside England, Italy, West Indies and Nepal, and are scheduled to play their first three matches in Kolkata and their final game in Mumbai. They face West Indies on February 7, the opening day of the tournament.BCB president Aminul Islam Bulbul revealed that Mustafizur Rahman‚Äôs removal from an IPL team due to security concerns triggered Bangladesh‚Äôs hardened stance against travelling to India.Bulbul said Mustafizur was neither injured nor had he withdrawn from the IPL. The BCB hadn't revoked his No Objection Certificate either. ‚ÄúHe was dropped due to security reasons,‚Äù Bulbul said, calling it a moment that raised serious red flags for Bangladesh cricket.According to Bulbul, once the BCB learned of Mustafizur‚Äôs removal, it immediately contacted the ICC on January 4.‚ÄúWe informed them of the situation and asked them to take it seriously,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIf a player can be removed from a league due to security concerns, how can we ignore those same concerns for a World Cup?‚ÄùBulbul added that the BCB proposed solutions rather than confrontation, citing past instances where neutral venues or hybrid models were adopted due to security issues in ICC tournaments.‚ÄúWe asked the ICC to follow that logic,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúLet us play the World Cup, but at a neutral venue like Sri Lanka or elsewhere.‚Äù
Article Summary: Bangladesh cricket board (bcb) has written another letter to the international cricket council (icc) requesting that bangladesh‚Äôs demand for a change of venue be referred to the icc‚Äùs independent dispute resolution committee. The committee consists of independent lawyers, resolves disputes related to icc matters.

Article Title: T20 World Cup drama: Last time Bangladesh was at the centre of an ICC event row, it led to a team replacement
Article Text:
Bangladesh cricketers (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Bangladesh cricket in turmoil: What it means for the T20 World Cup?

Poll How do you feel about the ICC's handling of the Bangladesh cricket team's situation? They've acted fairly They could have done better Undecided

Replacement teams in ICC events



Scotland replaced New Zealand in 2022:

Similar drama in 2009 T20 World Cup



The ICC T20 World Cup 2026 is just two weeks away, and the controversy over the participation of the Bangladesh cricket team in the tournament remains unresolved. The Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) on Thursday categorically announced, after a meeting with the country‚Äôs sports advisor and national team cricketers in Dhaka, that under no circumstances would it send the team to India to play matches, while blaming the International Cricket Council (ICC) for denying them ‚Äújustice‚Äù.The entire cricketing world is now waiting for the ICC‚Äôs next move. The global governing body had already voted on Wednesday against Bangladesh‚Äôs request for a venue shift to co-host Sri Lanka, while issuing a 24-hour ultimatum to the BCB.With the BCB virtually out of the tournament due to its defiant stand, the ICC now has to kickstart its contingency plan for the mega event sooner rather than later. Scotland has emerged as the frontrunner to play the World Cup in place of Bangladesh, with the ICC expected to make it official soon.What began as a controversy has turned into a never-ending drama since Indian Premier League franchise Kolkata Knight Riders were asked by the BCCI to release star Bangladesh pacer Mustafizur Rahman from their squad without any ‚Äúspecific‚Äù reason amid growing tensions between the two neighbouring countries.Bangladesh reacted immediately, deciding not to send its team to India for the T20 World Cup, while also banning the broadcast of the IPL in the country.Since then, a tussle between the ICC and the BCB over the venue shift has continued, and with the tournament just around the corner, a final decision is expected soon. Despite standing firm on its refusal to travel to India ‚Äî where Bangladesh are scheduled to play all three group matches in Kolkata and Mumbai ‚Äî the BCB has not formally announced its withdrawal from the tournament, leaving room for manoeuvre. However, any change in the ICC‚Äôs stance on altering the schedule so close to the event appears unlikely.If Scotland is officially announced as a replacement, would it be unprecedented? No. There have been precedents in past ICC events.An entire team being replaced by another for an ICC event is a rare occurrence, and the last time Bangladesh were involved in such a row was a decade ago, when they hosted the Under-19 World Cup in 2016.Australia withdrew from the ICC U19 World Cup in Bangladesh and were replaced by Ireland. The seeds of the withdrawal were sown a year earlier, when Australia pulled out of a bilateral series citing security concerns. With the situation not improving, Australia decided to stay away from the tournament.Australia‚Äôs official line at the time was that the ‚Äúthreat to Australian interests in Bangladesh‚Äù remained high. The ICC termed the decision ‚Äúdisappointing‚Äù before naming Ireland as the replacement. West Indies went on to win their maiden U19 World Cup title, beating India by five wickets in the final in Dhaka.Replacement of a team happened again at the U19 World Cup in 2022 too. This time, the New Zealand team withdrew due to strict Covid-19 quarantine regulations for minors upon return home. The ICC then brought in Scotland as the replacement team for the tournament held in the Caribbean.Before that, the 2009 T20 World Cup in England also saw a replacement team. The backdrop dated back to the 2003 ODI World Cup co-hosted by South Africa, Zimbabwe and Kenya, where England and New Zealand forfeited matches in Zimbabwe and Kenya respectively due to political and security concerns.In 2009, visa issues and political tensions again put Zimbabwe‚Äôs participation in doubt. Eventually, Zimbabwe withdrew with full participation fees, and Scotland were named as the replacement. Pakistan went on to win the tournament, defeating Sri Lanka by eight wickets in the final at Lord‚Äôs.
Article Summary: Bangladesh cricket board (bcb) refused to send team to india for t20 world cup. Icc voted against bangladesh‚Äôs request for a venue shift to co-host sri lanka, while issuing a 24-hour ultimatum to the bcb. Scotland has emerged as the frontrunner to play the world cup in place of bangladesh, with the icc expected to make it official soon.

Article Title: 'Stop the World Cup': Pakistan urged to boycott T20 WC in support of Bangladesh
Article Text:
Pakistan and Bangladesh cricket team (Agency Image)

Arshdeep Singh press conference: on adapting to conditions, team roles & bowling plans | IND vs NZ 1st T20I

Former Pakistan captain Rashid Latif has called on the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) to take a hard stance and boycott the upcoming Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup, urging it to stand shoulder to shoulder with Bangladesh amid the ongoing scheduling and security dispute.The Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) is facing the threat of being excluded from the 20-team tournament if it refuses to travel to India, citing security concerns. On Wednesday, the ICC made its position clear, stating that the original schedule would remain unchanged and that Bangladesh‚Äôs request to relocate its matches to Sri Lanka would not be entertained. The BCB has been given a 24-hour window to consult with its government and confirm whether the team will participate.With tensions simmering between the ICC and the BCB, Latif said this was the right moment for Pakistan to challenge what he described as the prevailing cricketing power structure by withdrawing from the tournament.Recent reports in Pakistani media suggest the PCB has already expressed solidarity with Bangladesh, with the board‚Äôs leadership even pausing the national team‚Äôs World Cup preparations while awaiting clarity on the situation.‚ÄúIf Pakistan and India don‚Äôt happen, 50 per cent of your World Cup is gone. This is a great opportunity to challenge the existing cricket order,‚Äù Latif said on the YouTube channel CaughtBehindShow.‚ÄúPakistan should say they stand with Bangladesh and refuse to play the T20 World Cup. This is the time to take a stand. You need a strong heart to do it,‚Äù he added.Latif also took aim at the ICC‚Äôs handling of the issue, questioning its refusal to consider Bangladesh‚Äôs request to move matches to Sri Lanka. He pointed out that similar adjustments had been made in the past when India and Pakistan declined to tour each other for global events.‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt feel like a good decision. Today, the ICC says there is no danger to Bangladeshi players in India. No agency in the world can say there is no danger ‚Äî how can the ICC say that?‚Äù Latif said. ‚ÄúEven in the most secure places, no one can give such a guarantee. Hopefully, nothing happens to any team.‚ÄùHe stressed that Pakistan holds significant leverage in the current scenario and should use it decisively.‚ÄúThe trump card is still with Pakistan. Bangladesh‚Äôs stance is right. Pakistan won‚Äôt get a better opportunity than this. Pakistan not playing would be like stopping the World Cup. Pakistan is the key,‚Äù Latif said. ‚ÄúYes, Pakistan could suffer in the future. There could be sanctions if Pakistan refuses to play ICC events. But there is no use of just words ‚Äî now is the time to show who you support.‚ÄùThe Men‚Äôs T20 World Cup is scheduled to be held in India and Sri Lanka from February 7 to March 8, with matches spread across eight venues. Bangladesh have been placed in Group C alongside England, Nepal, Italy and the West Indies. Pakistan, meanwhile, are drawn in Group A with India, Namibia, the Netherlands and the USA.
Article Summary: Former pakistan captain rashid latif has called on the pakistan cricket board (pcb) to take a hard stance and boycott the upcoming men‚Äôs t20 world cup. The bangladesh cricket board is facing the threat of being excluded from the 20-team tournament if it refuses to travel to india, citing security concerns.

Article Title: Mike McCarthy emerges as serious Steelers head coach candidate amid Aaron Rodgers' uncertain future
Article Text:
Mike McCarthy emerges as serious Steelers head coach candidate amid Aaron Rodgers' uncertain future



Steelers‚Äô interest in Mike McCarthy centers on Team Direction

The Steelers kicked off their head coach search with a move that shook up the rumor mill. Mike McCarthy entered the mix this week, and fans quickly tied his name to one storyline. Aaron Rodgers . The connection feels natural because of their long history in Green Bay. Still, league insiders say Pittsburgh‚Äôs interest goes beyond any quarterback reunion.Pittsburgh looks at a roster built to win now. Veterans lead both sides of the ball. The front office wants a coach who can step in and compete right away. That goal drives this search more than any single player.The key update came recently. NFL Network insider Tom Pelissero, on The Rich Eisen Show, addressed Rodgers' talk directly.‚ÄúI do believe that if Aaron Rodgers were coming back to play for one coach in 2026, it would be Mike McCarthy,‚Äù Pelissero said. ‚ÄúBut I think people may have misconstrued when I mentioned that on the show the other day as, ‚ÄòWell, this is the Steelers trying to lure back Aaron Rodgers.‚Äô That‚Äôs not it at all.‚ÄùPelissero added more context during the same appearance. ‚ÄúIf they hire Mike McCarthy, and that‚Äôs not a given, if they hire Mike McCarthy, they are doing it for the totality of what direction they think they can go right now,‚Äù Pelissero said.‚ÄúThey‚Äôve got a very, very veteran roster.‚ÄùThe Steelers interviewed McCarthy as they searched for a replacement for Mike Tomlin, who stepped down after the 2025 season. McCarthy brings 18 seasons of head coaching experience with the Packers and Big D. He holds a 174-112-2 career record and won Super Bowl XLV with Green Bay.A-Rod's future remains uncertain. ESPN insider Adam Schefter reported in January 2026 that Rodgers has not committed to retirement or a return to the Steelers. That uncertainty keeps the speculation alive, but Pittsburgh‚Äôs front office looks at the full picture.Tomlin left after 19 seasons in charge, ending one of the longest and most stable coaching tenures in NFL history. His exit has left a huge gap in Pittsburgh, and the crew are now carefully evaluating experienced names as they look to reset their direction.The Steelers want leadership, structure, and experience on the sideline. McCarthy‚Äôs r√©sum√© fits that need. Any Rodgers connection sits as a side note, not the driving force behind this search
Article Summary: Nfl network insider tom pelissero says the steelers are not trying to lure back aaron rodgers. The steelers interviewed mccarthy as they searched for a replacement for mike tomlin, who stepped down after the 2025 season. Mccarthy brings 18 seasons of head coaching experience with the packers and big d. a-rod's future remains uncertain.

Article Title: WWE 2K26 release date, Attitude Era edition, platforms, roster, and more details
Article Text:
Image via 2K Games

WWE 2K26 release date and pre-order information



WWE 2K26 Attitude Era edition



WWE 2K26 platforms and availability



WWE 2K26 roster highlights



WWE 2K26 gameplay features



WWE 2K26 has been officially announced by 2K Sports, and it is the next installment in the long-running wrestling video game franchise. The upcoming title will essentially deliver significant upgrades to 2K25 while also introducing some exciting new features.The game promises to be one of the most complete entries in the series history, and pre-orders for the same are set to open very soon. They have also recently announced an Attitude Era edition, adding to the overall excitement.Here are all the details that you need to know about WWE 2K26.2K Sports has not confirmed the official release date for WWE 2K26, but the game is scheduled to release within Take-Two Interactive's fiscal year ending March 31, 2026. There are speculations that it will be released in early March 2026.The early March 2026 release date follows the pattern of recent years, which perfectly coincides with the road to Wrestlemania. Speaking of the pre-orders for WWE 2K26, they officially open on January 30, 2026, with early access available for deluxe and collector editions.WWE and 2K have announced the Attitude Era Edition, which is a special edition celebrating the legendary era of professional wrestling.The official cover was revealed on WWE SmackDown, and it featured some of the most iconic superstars from that period.This special edition will essentially capitalize on nostalgia for one of wrestling's most popular eras. The cover art featured legends including Steve Austin, Triple H, Kane, The Undertaker, Shawn Michaels, The Rock, Kurt Angle, Trish Stratus, and Lita.The exact platforms on which WWE 2K26 will be released have not been announced officially. However, it is expected that the game will be arriving on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC. This is because WWE 2K25 was released on these platforms, and similar support can be anticipated for the upcoming title.There are chances that the game could come to Nintendo Switch 2. It is better to wait for the official details before confirming anything.The WWE 2K26 roster will feature the up-to-date lineup of current superstars, including Roman Reigns, CM Punk, Cody Rhodes, Becky Lynch, Rhea Ripley, Liv Morgan, Bianca Belair, and more. The NXT roster is also rumored to be expanding with new additions and fresh faces from the brand.Coming to the gameplay, the headline addition to WWE 2K26 is a full CM Punk Showcase mode dedicated to his career. It will feature everything from his early WWE rise to his 2023 return, offering playable matches and documentary-style cutscenes. The Island mode is also reportedly making a comeback with a new storyline where Roman Reigns has been knocked off the top, and three factions fight for control of the Island of Relevancy.Additionally, new match types are expected in WWE 2K26, including I Quit, Inferno, 3 Stages of Hell, and Dumpster Match. Intergender matches will also likely expand across more modes, including MyFaction.This was all you needed to know about WWE 2K26.
Article Summary: Wwe 2k26 has been officially announced by 2k sports, and it is the next installment in the long-running wrestling video game franchise. The game promises to be one of the most complete entries in the series history, and pre-orders for the same are set to open very soon.

Article Title: Revealed! Why Suryakumar Yadav was angry at Ishan Kishan during 2nd T20I vs New Zealand
Article Text:
Suryakumar Yadav and Ishan Kishan (PTI Photo)

Shivam Dube press conference: On Ishan and Surya‚Äôs knock & his role with the ball

NEW DELHI: Indian skipper Suryakumar Yadav said the hosts want their batters to play with freedom and express themselves, praising Ishan Kishan ‚Äôs fearless strokeplay as a true reflection of the team‚Äôs mindset after India defeated New Zealand by seven wickets in the second T20I in Raipur on Friday.Despite some assistance from the dew, India‚Äôs chase of 209 began on a shaky note. Sanju Samson departed for 6, Abhishek Sharma fell for a golden duck, and the hosts were suddenly reeling at 6 for 2. What followed, however, was a breathtaking counterattack as Ishan Kishan and Suryakumar Yadav added 122 runs in just 48 balls for the third wicket, transforming what appeared to be a daunting chase into a comfortable one.Kishan did most of the early damage with his aggressive approach, scoring 76 off 32 balls, including a 21-ball fifty, before mis-hitting Ish Sodhi for a catch off the bowler‚Äôs own bowling. By then, the contest had already swung decisively in India‚Äôs favour.Suryakumar, meanwhile, finished with a superb 82 off just 37 balls, once again underlining his class and importance to the side only weeks ahead of a home T20 World Cup."I didn't know what Ishan had for lunch. Never saw anyone hit the ball like he did. This is what we want from the batters to go out there and express themselves, be happy. I was angry he didn't give me a strike in the Power-play.But I knew that we had time and could cover up. I was batting really well in the nets, I got some good time with family and friends, and I am enjoying what's happening right now," Suryakumar Yadav said after the match.The emphatic finish also became the biggest win by balls remaining for a full-member nation while chasing a target of over 200. It surpassed Pakistan‚Äôs 24-ball win against New Zealand in Auckland in 2025 and Australia‚Äôs 23-ball victory over West Indies in Basseterre in the same year.India‚Äôs bowling, however, had its struggles. Arshdeep Singh endured a difficult outing, conceding 53 runs without a wicket. Hardik Pandya was more economical, returning figures of 1 for 25 from three overs, while Harshit Rana, despite bowling a wicket maiden, finished with 1 for 35 from three overs. The spin pair of Kuldeep Yadav and Varun Chakaravarthy combined for eight overs, claiming three wickets while giving away 70 runs. Shivam Dube also chipped in with a wicket.Suryakumar praised the collective bowling effort, admitting that India had feared New Zealand could push the total to 225‚Äì230, while singling out Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Shivam Dube and Hardik Pandya for restricting the visitors to 208."It was an incredible effort. We thought they would add 225-230. The way Kuldeep, Varun, Dube, and Hardik. Everyone took their responsibility, and to restrict them to under 210 was a great effort."He also highlighted the relaxed and positive atmosphere within the camp, stressing that India remain committed to playing their brand of cricket while giving their all in every aspect."I am really enjoying. The mood in the camp is happy. We want to play the same brand of cricket and leave no stone unturned."
Article Summary: India defeated new zealand by seven wickets in the second t20i in raipur on friday. Suryakumar yadav praised ishan kishan's fearless strokeplay as a true reflection of the team's mindset. Kuldeep yadav, varun chakaravarthy, shivam dube and hardik pandya took three wickets each for india.

Article Title: How to get The Office skins in Fortnite
Article Text:
Image via Fortnite

How to get The Office skins in Fortnite



Dwight Schrute (Outfit)

Dwight Schrute (Outfit - LEGO Style)

Michael Scott (Outfit)

Michael Scott (Outfit - LEGO Style)

World's Best Boss Mug (Back Bling)

Megadesk (Glider)

Kevin's Dress Shoes (Kicks)

Dwight's Lil' Lead Car (Emote)

The Scarn (Emote)

Broom-Skate (Pickaxe)

Dundie (Pickaxe)

How long will The Office skins remain available in Fortnite Item Shop?



Following the recent v39.30 patch, the highly anticipated collaboration with The Office is now available in Fortnite. It has ended up introducing some of the most popular television characters to the battle royale experience. This is yet another significant crossover for the game, after recent collaborations with The Simpsons and South Park.Like every other collaboration, Epic Games has introduced a variety of themed cosmetics that you can get from the game's Item Shop. The major highlights are special outfits for characters like Dwight Schrute and Michael Scott. Besides their outfits, you can also get themed cosmetic items like Back Blings, Pickaxes, and Emotes featuring elements from the show.Here are all the details on how you can get The Office skins from the Fortnite Item Shop.The Office skins are currently live in the Fortnite Item Shop, and if you want the complete experience, you can get the "The Office Bundle." It is currently available for 3,000 V-Bucks and offers great value, letting you save a lot compared to buying the items individually.Here is a list of all the items that are included in The Office Bundle:You also have the option to buy the items individually. For instance, the Dwight Schrute Outfit and Michael Scott Outfit each cost 1,500 V-Bucks individually, and you can get the same if you only want the outfit for particular characters.However, the bundle is ultimately the better option, and it is better to get the same for the price it is being offered at.Like most major crossovers, The Office skins are part of a limited-time event. You will have around a week to secure these items before they rotate out of the shop. Essentially, The Office skins are going to remain available in the Fortnite Item Shop until January 30, 2026, at 8 PM ET. Accordingly, you are advised to get them as soon as possible, given that there is no guarantee when the skins will return to the battle royale experience.This was all you needed to know about obtaining The Office skins in Fortnite.
Article Summary: The office skins are currently live in the fortnite item shop. You can get the "the office bundle" for 3,000 v-bucks. The office skins will remain available in the item shop until january 30, 2026. There is no guarantee when the skins will return.

Article Title: DJ Akademiks says NBA YoungBoy tried to contact Kai Cenat over cheating rumors
Article Text:
Photo by Prince Williams/FilmMagic

NBA YoungBoy reportedly frustrated after Kai Cenat ignores outreach





DJ Akademiks has added new details to the ongoing drama involving Kai Cenat, NBA YoungBoy, and rumors of an alleged affair. Speaking on stream, Akademiks claimed that NBA YoungBoy personally attempted to reach out to Kai Cenat to clear his name after online speculation linked him to Kai‚Äôs ex-girlfriend, Gigi Alayah. According to Akademiks, Kai did not respond to the outreach, which has left NBA YoungBoy‚Äôs camp frustrated. They believe the rumor has continued to spread because there was no direct conversation to shut it down early, despite YoungBoy strongly denying any involvement.The controversy began shortly after Kai Cenat announced his breakup on December 27, 2025, posting online that he was single and stepping away from relationships. Soon after, unverified posts started circulating on X, claiming Gigi Alayah had cheated on Kai with NBA YoungBoy. The story quickly gained traction across social media, pulling multiple high-profile names into the discussion. Gigi later responded publicly, denying the allegations and stating she ended the relationship herself, never cheated, and had no connection to NBA YoungBoy.Akademiks explained that while he is not placing blame on Kai Cenat, the lack of communication has allowed the rumor to linger.He claimed NBA YoungBoy wanted a direct conversation with Kai to deny the allegations and stop fans from associating his name with the situation. According to Akademiks, YoungBoy‚Äôs team believes the timing of the rumor was suspicious and possibly planted, especially given how quickly it spread following Kai‚Äôs breakup announcement.The rapper‚Äôs camp is reportedly unhappy because the situation continues to affect YoungBoy‚Äôs reputation, even though he has denied the claims. Akademiks urged Kai to take the call, suggesting that a private discussion could help put the issue to rest. However, as of now, no reconciliation or public clarification between the two has taken place. Fans continue to debate the situation, keeping the story alive in both hip-hop and streaming communities.For Kai Cenat, the drama occurs at a time when he has been very open and outspoken about seeking healing and personal growth after the breakup. On one hand, he may have decided to keep quiet on the rumors; nevertheless, the fact that he is keeping quiet is a big part of the debate. As long as there is no direct communication and statement between all parties involved, one will know how rumor and drama can escalate online concerning popular personalities.
Article Summary: Nba youngboy reportedly frustrated after kai cenat ignores outreach to clear his name.
